he placed

about

damage
> had been inflicted. "You're trying to hurt me with fire?" the 
dragon had a
> grin ear to pointy ear, "I master the elements and you're trying to 
hurt me
> with fire!"  He couldn't help laughing at the desperate move his 
opponent
> had just made. "
> 
> Necromancers eyes began to glow, smoke rose from his nostrils. "Let 
me show
> you just how well I master it." The great dragon opened his mouth 
and
